entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 18.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Risk of thunderstorms near the Rockies late this afternoon. Local smoke late this morning and this afternoon. High 18. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Risk of thunderstorms near the Rockies early this evening. Local smoke. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 21. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the afternoon. Local smoke. High 21. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Monday 8 May 2023
